slpjq-slider.tpl.php

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 <?php
00002 // $Id$
00003 /**
00004  * @file
00005  * Template to display the SlipJaq slider
00006  *
00007  * Available variables:
00008  * - $logged_in: TRUE if a user is currently logged in.
00009  * - $title: The formatted title for the slider.
00010  * - $image_url: The URL of an image to display.
00011  * - $user_register: TRUE if a user is allowed to self-register.
00012  *
00013  * The following variables are not passed in, but may also be set as a customization:
00014  * - $slpjq_start_open: TRUE if to start with the slider already open.
00015  *
00016  * @see slpjq_theme()
00017  *
00018  * @code
00019  * This HTML is derived from a work by Jérémie Tisseau:
00020  * http://web-kreation.com/index.php/tutorials/nice-clean-sliding-login-panel-built-with-jquery/
00021  *
00022  * Modifications for Drupal © 2010 teeny-tiny websites
00023  * http://www.teenytinywebsites.com
00024  *
00025  * Distributed under the terms of the GNU General Public License, version 3.0
00026  * http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.html
00027  * @endcode
00028  */
00029 
00030 /**
00031  * @cond
00032  */
00033 ?>
00034 <div id="slpjq_toppanel">
00035   <?php if (!$logged_in): ?>
00036   <div id="slpjq_panel"<?php
00037     if ($slpjq_start_open) {
00038       print " style=\"display: block;\"";
00039     } ?>>
00040     <div class="slpjq-content slpjq-clearfix">
00041       <div class="slpjq-left">
00042       <?php if ($title || $image_url): ?>
00043         <?php if ($title): ?>
00044           <h1 class="slpjq-title"><?php print $title; ?></h1>
00045         <?php endif; ?>
00046         <?php if ($image_url): ?>
00047           <img class="slpjq-image" src="<?php print $image_url; ?>" />
00048         <?php endif; ?>
00049       <?php else: ?>
00050         &nbsp;
00051       <?php endif; ?>
00052       </div>
00053       <div class="slpjq-center">
00054         <h1><?php print t('Member login'); ?></h1>
00055         <?php print drupal_get_form('user_login_block'); ?>
00056         <p><a href="/user/password"><?php print t('Request new password'); ?></a></p>
00057       </div>
00058       <?php if ($user_register): ?>
00059       <div class="slpjq-left slpjq-right">
00060         <h1><?php print t('Not a member yet?') . " " . t('Register!'); ?></h1>
00061         <?php print drupal_get_form('user_register'); ?>
00062       </div>
00063       <?php endif; ?>
00064     </div>
00065   </div> <!-- /#slpjq_panel -->
00066   <?php endif; // logged in ?>
00067   <div class="slpjq-tab">
00068     <ul class="<?php print $logged_in?"slpjq-logout":"slpjq-login"; ?>">
00069       <li class="slpjq-left">&nbsp;</li>
00070       <?php if ($logged_in): ?>
00071       <li><?php print t('Hello, !user',
00072             array('!user' =>
00073               "<a href=\"/user\" title=\"" . t('View member profile') . "\">" . htmlspecialchars($user->name) . "</a>"));?></li>
00074       <li class="slpjq-sep"></li>
00075       <li><a id="slpjq_logout" class="slpjq-logout" href="/logout"><?php print t('Log out'); ?></a></li>
00076       <?php else: ?>
00077       <li><?php print t('Hello, Guest'); ?></li>
00078       <li id="slpjq_toggle">
00079         <a id="slpjq_open"<?php
00080         if ($slpjq_start_open) {
00081           print " style=\"display: none;\"";
00082         } ?> class="slpjq-open" href="#"><?php
00083         print t('Log in');
00084         if ($user_register) {
00085           print ' | ' . t('Register');
00086         }
00087         ?></a>
00088         <a id="slpjq_close"<?php
00089         if (!$slpjq_start_open) {
00090           print " style=\"display: none;\"";
00091         } ?> class="slpjq-close" href="#"><?php print t('Close panel'); ?></a>
00092       </li>
00093       <?php endif; ?>
00094       <li class="slpjq-right">&nbsp;</li>
00095     </ul>
00096   </div> <!-- /#slpjq-tab -->
00097 </div> <!-- /#slpjq_toppanel -->
00098 <?php
00099 /**
00100  * @endcond
00101  */
